text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org version 2.7
    CodeDisplay
    59826-8Creatinine [Moles/volume] in Blood
    51619-5Creatinine [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma --pre dialysis
    51620-3Creatinine [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma --post dialysis
    2160-0Creatinine [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    72271-0Creatinine [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma --pre contrast
    14682-9Creatinine [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    38483-4Creatinine [Mass/volume] in Blood
    96590-5Creatinine [Mass/volume] in DBS
  • Include these codes as defined in https://www.mdanderson.org/oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.412.2.7.5.737384.134 version 1
    CodeDisplay
    5399Creatinine
    6673POC Crea
